programme.title: Carter's three bills passed
programme.short_synopsis: Carter's three main bills finally get approval.
programme.medium_synopsis: President Carter's three main policy bills finally win Congress over.
programme.long_synopsis:
President Carter's three main policy bills finally win Congress over.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
